mapper.select: select * from manage where handler_id = #{id} and mana_status = #{status} order by (select submit_time from trouble t, manage m where t.trouble_key = m.manage_id) desc limit ${page},${pageSize}
select count(*) from manage where handler_id = #{id} and mana_status = #{status}
select count(*) from manage where mana_status in (0, 1, 2) and #{time} = (select submit_time from trouble t, manage m where t.trouble_key = m.manage_id)
